text:
Morning ya'll :wave::coffee:
> We're trying to create some basic documentation on how to import a CSV into HubDB... Anyone here interested in helping document that? :pray::pray::pray: #OpenSourceDocumentation
step one - teach client to save xslx file as CSV
but in all seriousness i am in for helping out

i assume it would contain text on creating your table with columns, export to CSV and import into Google Sheets to edit?

Also a table list of field types and acceptable values and some verbage on how to map them to your table

Once we have a small group of collaborators, we can flush out exactly what to include in the documentation.

Probably will want to show a few common uses / examples of importing/exporting.
By the end of the day, I'll pull anyone interested together and well start sorting the details.
I'm down to help...I like Excel :slightly_smiling_face:
niiiice thanks <@U26D0TF8E>! - will follow up with everyone EOD or first thing tomorrow.

<@U504BHZ6K> or <@U7SL518D6> - Know you're busy... LMK if you have time/interest. If not, no worries. It's not a big project, I'm confident <@U2H3TT8F2> and <@U26D0TF8E> can tackle it. :raised_hands: But LMK if you're down
Anyone have any live examples of an event calendar with HubDB?
